Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

MILES_LIST_DLS_FLAGS

The basic type MILES_LIST_DLS_FLAGS specifies flags to use when listing a DLS file.

Fundamental Values

 Value  Description
 AILDLSLIST_ARTICULATION Display DLS articulation data (makes the listing much larger).
 AILDLSLIST_DUMP_WAVS This flag causes each of the individual wave files inside the DLS file to be dumped into a subdirectory off the current directory named "filename Samples".


Group: Utility Services
Related Functions: AIL_list_DLS
